title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.9 - Tie-in sales prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.9 - Tie-in sales prohibited

State Regulations

No insurer shall sell insurance pursuant to a mass merchandising plan if: (a) the purchase of insurance available under such plan is contingent upon the purchase of any other insurance, product or service; or
(b) the purchase of any other insurance, product or service is contingent upon the purchase of insurance available under such plan. This provision shall not be deemed to prohibit the reasonable requirement of safety devices, such as heat detectors, lightning rods, theft prevention equipment and the like. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11

13.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
